The council meeting will start at 7:00 p.m. Councilors are scheduled to hear reports from the Park...

entry.title: OREGON STATE PARKS DAY COMING ON JUNE 7TH

entry.title: Zumba in the Park returns in June
entry.summary: ROSEBURG — Zumba in the Park returns to Roseburg's Stewart Park every Wednesday from June 18 to Aug. 27.

entry.title: Phoenix Charter School has a decision to make
entry.summary: The Roseburg Public Schools board of education voted to not renew the contract to sponsor Phoenix Charter School at a school board meeting Wednesday at Fremont Middle School.

entry.title: RPS BOARD VOTES NOT TO RENEW SPONSORSHIP OF PHOENIX SCHOOL
entry.summary: May 16, 2025 3:40 a.m. On Wednesday, the Roseburg Public Schools Board of Directors voted to not renew its sponsorship of Phoenix Charter School, citing concerns over noncompliance with contractual obligations, and state and federal laws. An RPS release said the unanimous decision follows the completion of the legally required charter renewal process under state...

entry.title: DEADLINE APPROACHING TO APPLY FOR A DTO SCHOLARSHIP
entry.summary: May 16, 2025 2:50 a.m. The deadline for students to apply for a scholarship from Douglas Timber Operators is approaching. Applicants must live in Douglas, Coos, or Lane counties and plan to major in a natural resources related field. Scholarships are open to students attending any accredited public or private post-secondary institution in Oregon or...
